name: Neon Nights (itch)
description:
Welcome to the Neon Nights! 

You are on the planet Narwhaleis and it is your job to learn how to shoot in this VR Game. Aim for the Evil pyramids and take them out. Can you kill them all??

Yeet Yeet! Made in 48 hours for the Design and Play game jam 2019 Calgary 

Created By

  • Jarvis Gibb
  • James Karg
  • Omar Hussain
  • Forest Park

Music - No BPM - http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/Loveshadow/58707 - Remix by Forest Park. 

Special thanks to our friends and family, The other teams at the jam, Boston Pizza, Platform Calgary, The CGDA and The organizers of the Design and Play Jam.
